mapper.select: select * from channel WHERE company_no = (select company_no from company_member WHERE user_no = #{user_no})
mapper.insert: insert into channel(company_no, name, type, reg_datetime, updated_datetime) VALUES (#{company_no}, #{name}, #{type}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update channel SET name = #{name}, updated_datetime = now() WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.select: select *, EXISTS((select * from channel_like WHERE channel_like.channel_no = channel.no AND company_member_no = (select no from company_member WHERE user_no = #{user_no}))) as bookmark from channel WHERE company_no = #{company_no}
